Name: Broccoli
Description: The soft top of this vegetable is leafy and fluffy.

DescriptionLocalization.es: La parte superior de este vegetal es frondosa y es esponjosa.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 이 야채는 위에 잎이 많고 푹신합니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Es hat einen weichen, fluffigen Kopf, es sieht aus wie ein kleiner Baum.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: O topo macio deste vegetal é folhoso e fofo.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 这种蔬菜柔软的顶部有着蓬松的小叶子。
